body: A shame its mislabled as shotacon as this was an enjoyable read

This is why I like the. He can make wholesome stories as well as some of the hottest sex scenes in doujin. He doesn't need to resort to ntr to get others to notice his work. There is a reason that if you look at the popular section of artists that have done both ntr and no not the non ntr is almost never the most popular. Cuz more people hate or dislike it than like it. It's a statistical fact that less people like ntr than more.
This couldn't have gone any better
No wonder this dude wears a guard; anyone would have trouble running with three legs.
V A N I L L A
